Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the exterior is covered with traces of a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394334) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394334)
